verbs.description: Traffic in midtown Manhattan [V: could] be worse than usual on Wednesday afternoon as President Donald Trump 's motorcade heads to a scheduled event .

[ARG1: Traffic in midtown Manhattan] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: be] [ARG2: worse than usual] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday afternoon] [ARGM-TMP: as President Donald Trump 's motorcade heads to a scheduled event] .
Traffic in midtown Manhattan could be worse than usual on Wednesday afternoon as President Donald Trump 's motorcade heads to a [V: scheduled] [ARG1: event] .
